dmca.title: [ABUSE] Notice ID: 22-362618 Notice of Unauthorized Use of Paramount Pictures Propert
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 25, 2005 7:47 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice ID: 22-362618 Notice of Unauthorized Use of
Paramount Pictures Property]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


- -------- Original Message --------
From: - Mon Apr 25 19:43:48 2005
X-Mozilla-Status: 0001
X-Mozilla-Status2: 00000000
Received: from [172.16.214.180] (helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com)        by
mail
with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)        (Exim 4.50)        id
1DQDU1-0002Lm-Cr        for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Mon, 25 Apr 2005
18:59:21 -0500
Received: from spooling.theplanet.com ([69.56.141.4]
helo=lili.theplanet.com)        by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)        with smtp (Exim)        id
1DQDTz-0001I2-52
for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Mon, 25 Apr 2005 18:59:21 -0500
Received: (qmail 9515 invoked from network); 25 Apr 2005 23:59:18 -0000
Received: from unknown (HELO ?216.185.111.52?) (172.16.214.110)  by
lili.theplanet.com with SMTP; 25 Apr 2005 23:59:18 -0000
Received: from [172.16.214.181] (helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)        by
mail
with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim 4.50)        id
1DQDTx-0002LV-7T        for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 25 Apr 2005 18:59:17
-0500
Received: from [216.133.204.227] (helo=mail.baytsp.com)        by
mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
paramount-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com) with esmtp (Exim)        id
1DQDTf-000JOZ-LN        for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 25 Apr 2005 18:59:17
-0500
Received: from 216.133.221.254 [216.133.221.254] by mail.baytsp.com        with
XWall v3.28 ; Mon, 25 Apr 2005 16:58:31 -0700
From: paramount-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Date: Mon, 25 Apr 2005 16:58:30 -0700
Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of
copyright-compliance.com designates 216.133.204.227 as        permitted
sender) client-ip=216.133.204.227;
envelope-from=paramount-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com;
helo=mail.baytsp.com;
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -97.0
Cc:
Subject: [ABUSE] Notice ID: 22-362618 Notice of Unauthorized Use of
Paramount Pictures Property
X-BeenThere: abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.5
Precedence: list
Reply-To: paramount-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com
List-Id: abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post: <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help: <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -97.0

Notice ID: 22-362618
Notice  Date: 25 Apr 2005 23:54:06 GMT

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

Dear Sir or Madam:

BayTSP, Inc. ("BayTSP") swears under penalty of perjury that Paramount
Pictures Corporation ("Paramount") has authorized BayTSP to act as its
non-exclusive agent for copyright infringement notification. BayTSP's search
of the protocol listed below has detected infringements of Paramount's
copyright interests on your IP addresses as detailed in the attached report.

BayTSP has reasonable good faith belief that use of the material in the
manner complained of in the attached report is not authorized by Paramount,
its agents, or the law. The information provided herein is accurate to the
best of our knowledge. Therefore, this letter is an official notification to
effect removal of the detected infringement listed in the attached report.
The attached documentation specifies the exact location of the infringement.

We hereby request that you immediately remove or block access to the
infringing material, as specified in the copyright laws, and insure the user
refrains from using or sharing with others Paramount's materials in the
future (see, 17 U.S.C.
